BUNG I INAWPNA LAMA HMALAKNA (Initiatives on Public Administration)

 1. KALPHUNG THAR - Rorelna Ruangamah 

i. Val Upa Council – Advisory Council of Elders kaihhruainain sorkar ruangâm siam a ni ang.

ii. Hruaitu lu ber Chief Minister lal falna - Minister, MLA leh party mite pawhin intlawnsiak ngai khawpa lalhrawtna ang chite a awm ve lohna turin ‘Inrawn Tlang Zela Rorelna – Collective Leadership’ ang zawngin sorkar kalpui a ni ang.

iii. Chief Minister nihna leh Party President nihna mi pakhatin a chelh kawp lo ang a, a hran ve ve a neih a ni ang. iv. Chief Minister-in Major Department a enkawl ve lo ang a, Council of Minister-te hnathawh dan a enpui vek thung ang.

v. Department kalphung inzul deuhte chu dahkhawm (sectorise) an ni ang a, a theih chen chenah Minister leh Secretary-ten inkawpin an enkawl ang.

vi. New Secretariat Complex-ah CM leh Minister Office leh Secretariat Office zawng zawng dah a ni ang.

vii. Cabinet Meeting hi Aizawl-ah chauh nei lovin, District khawpui dangah pawh neih ve thin a ni ang.

viii. MLA-te mimal ta tur car man to tak tak sorkar suma lei thin hi tihtawp a ni ang.

ix. Mi pakhatin sorkar motor pakhat aia tam kawl awih a ni lo vang.

x. Sorkar thar kum nga hun chhungin Minister/MLA te hlawh leh hamthatna tihpun a ni lovang.

xi. MLA-te chu an bial mipuite dawr theih turin thla khatah ni thum aia tlem lo an bial chhungah an awm thin ang.


2.KALPHUNG THAR – Corruption Dona Kawngah
 Full Combat on Corruption
 Mizoram hmasawnnna lama pawt hniamtu ber Eirukna tireh tura, sorkar-in hmanraw chi hrang hrang a neih tawh sate chu huai takin kan hmang ang a. Kan hruaitu lu ber ber te chu Eiruk dona leh tihremna kawnga hmalatu leh hruaitu an ni ang. 

Hmalak dan tur:
 
i. Val Upa Council-in ministry a uap ang. Kawm ngai a kawm ang a, zilh leh fuih ngaite a zilhin a fuih ang. ii. Vigillance Commssion a din ang a, dipdaltu awm lovin hlemhletna ven kawngah hna an thawk ang.

iii. The Mizoram Lokayukta Act 2014 hi a that tawk lohna lai engemaw zat a awm avangin, hengte hi siamtha (amend) in, Chief Minister pawh chhui thei tur khawpa thuneiin kan siam tha ang a, hman thuai a ni ang. 
iv. Anti Corruption Bureau awmsa hi tilianin, zalen taka hnathawk thei turin thuneihna zau zawk pein kan thuam chak ang.

v. Rights to Information (RTI) hmanga mimalin emaw, pawlin emaw sorkar department-a thiltih dik loh an haichhuahte reng reng chu, sorkar-in ngawih bosan mai lovin a enzui ang a; hrem ngai an nih chuan huai takin a hrem ang.

vi. Central Bureau of Investigation - CBI hi tul bik thilah chuan Mizoram chhunga hna an thawh kan phalsak ang. vii. Comptroller and Auditor General of India -in kumtina state-ten pawisa an hman dan report a pek thin te chu, inenfiahna tha taka ngaiin report duhawm lo (adverse reports/ remarks) nei lo turin sum hman chungchangah dik tak leh fimkhur takin kan kal ang. 
viii. Social Audit – sorkar pawisa hmandan endik hi kan uar hle ang.

 
3. KALPHUNG THAR - Thuneihna leh mawhphurhna Semzai kawngah 
Decentralization of Authority

i. Thuneihna leh mawhphurhna sem zaina turin Tualchhung Ro inrelna (Local Self Government) hman a ni ang. India Danpui Siamthatna 74-nain a phal angin, Tualchhung Ro inrelnate hi Mizo khawtlang inrelbawlna dan leh nunphung leh khawsak danphung mil thei ang bera her remin siam that a ni ang.

ii. India Danpui Siamthatna 74-nain a phal angin, Tualchhung Ro inrelnate hi Mizo khawtlang inrelbawlna dan leh nunphung leh khawsak danphung mil thei ang bera her remin siam that a ni ang.

iii. Panchayati Raj hi Village Council kan neih lai zulzuia her remin, a hming pawh vuah thaa hman a ni ang.

iv. Khaw tinah Local Development Committee din a ni ang.

v. A remchang apiangah Municipalities din a ni ang.

vi. MLA Constituency tinah Development Block dah a ni ang a, Block tinah Development Committee din a ni ang. Sawrkarin Budget a siamah Block Budget tur a hrana dah a ni ang.

vii. District tinah Development Committee a awm ang.

viii. Sorkar enkawl thin mipui kuta dah thin – Outsourcing and Communitization: Water supply, Power supply, Sanitation, Sub-Health Centre etc. enkawl hnate hi khawchhung mipuite kutah dah a ni ang.

ix. Khaw chhunga thawk tur school zirtirtu lak leh ban thlengin Managing Committee kutah dah a ni ang a. Sorkar chu a endiktu - supervisor leh mawhphurhna latu - facilitator a ni chauh ang.

x. District tinah ‘District Develoment and Monitoring Committee’ a awm ang a, State level-ah pawh hetiang bawk hi a awm ang.

xi. Sorkar atanga |anpuina dawng tur thlanna Tehfung (criteria) atan party nihna hmang lovin, ‘Mamawhna’ (need-base) leh ‘Hlawhtlinpui thei tur’ thlir (prospective - success) zawnga kalpui a ni ang. 

 4. KALPHUNG THAR - Mizoram Statistical Record Dik tak neih Ram hmasawnna thawk tak tak tur chuan Statistical Record dik leh rintlâk neih hmasak a ngaih avangin, kawng engkima hmantlâk tur ‘Mizoram Comprehensive Statistical Record’ kan siam ang.

Hmalak dân tur:

i. Village Record/Register: Khaw pakhat bik chhunga thil hriat tur tul zawng zawng ziah khawmna.

ii. Block Record/Register: Community Development Block chhűnga thil hriat tur tul zawng zawngte ziah khâwmna.

iii. District Record/Register: Administrative District chhunga thil hriat tur tul zawng zawng ziahkhawmna.

iv. State Record/Register: A hmaa Record pathum - Village/ Block/District Record-te lak khawmna.


5.KALPHUNG THAR -

Sum Renchemna Kalpui kawngah 
Institution of Austerity Measures 
Mipui sum - Public Money hman kawngah inremchem leh daihzai thei ang zawng berin kan kal ni ang. Hmalak dân tur: 
i. Sorkar-in Assembly Term thar apianga MLA-ten Motor thar an leina atana Rs. 8,00,000 a thlawna a pek thin hi tihtawp a ni ang.

ii. Sorkar inthlâk vang maia Chief Minister/Minister/Speakerten motor thar neih kher leh, Minister bangla chhung bungruate a thara thlak kher ang te hi tih a ni lovang.

iii. Sorkar hnathawk motor hmang thei tur chin bithliahna dan (entitlement) fel tak tak duan chhuah a ni ang.

iv. Department chelhkawp avanga Officer lianten motor 2/3 an kawl kawp ang chite hi tih bo a ni ang.

v. Minister leh Officer liante enkawlna hautak lutuk ang te hi tihniamin, sorkar-in thil pawimawh a tih (function)-a pawisa hman kawngah pawh a inrenchem zâwng z>lin kan ang.

vi. Thil hawn (Inaugural Function) ang chi reng rengah, a huau huau zawnga kal lovin mipui pawisa khawhral tlem thei ang zawng zela kalpui a ni ang a. Thil lian tham leh pawimawh bikah te chauh lo chuan Minister-te chu khual lianah an tang fo lovang.

BUNG II 
POLITIKS LAM - Ram leh hnam enkawlna (Initiatives on Political Administration)

 1. KALPHUNG THAR – Hnam Humhimna Kawngah

i. Zo hnahthlâkte insuihkhawm lehna atan ZORO nen tangrualin ngawrh taka thawh a ni ang.

ii. |henawm state-te nena kan ramri chingfel turin Boundary Commission din a ni ang.

iii. Mizoram hi a puma Tribal Area kan nih leh theih nan hma lak a ni ang.

iv. Hnam inchimralna (assimilation) dang turin Foreigners dan lova lo lutte um chhuak tur leh, lo luh belh zel turte dang turin, Dan dinglai hmangin chak taka hmalâk a ni ang.

 v. Inner Line Permit pek chhuah dân hi computerized-in fimkhur zawk leh awmze nei zawka kalpui a ni ang. vi. Mizoramah mihring kan lo tama, kan ram leilung hausaknate hi kan hman tangkai zawk theih nân, nupa fa pathum aia tam neite hnęnah sorkar-in hamthatna (incentives) bik a siamsak ang. 


2. KALPHUNG THAR –
 Mizo khawtlang nun leh Hnam mizia chawisânna. Resurgence of Mizo culture and spirit of patriotism 

i.Zofate rilru putphung - ram hmangaihna (Mizo nationalism), ram tana inpekna, sakhaw ngaihsakmi nihna, Zonunmawi – tlawmngaihna, rinawmna, miretheite ngaihsakmi nihna, inthliarhranna rilru put lohna te leh, aia upate zahthiamna te hi chawi vul a, chawmnung a, siamthat ngai lai apiangte siamtha turin hma kan la ang. 

ii. INTAC Mizoram Chapter hmalakna chawisangin, pipute sulhnu humhalh (preservation) leh zawnchhuah thar (exploration) kawngah hmalak a ni ang. 

iii. Chapchar Kut hi khawv>l puma Zofaten thlahlel leh ropui zawka kan hman ho theih dân turin ruahmanna tha zawk siam a ni ang. 

iv. Hnam nun chawisangtu pawl lian YMA leh pawl dangte thawhpuia siamin, Mizo hnam incheina hrang hrangte hmang uar tura inzirtirna chak taka kalpui a ni ang.

 v. Hmanlai pi leh pute hun laia pasaltha, mihuaisen leh Zoram chhanna atâna lo bei tawhtute kha, hnam tâna ‘Martar-ah’ puangin, anmahni zahna, chawimawina, leh hriatrengna siam kawngah uar zawka hmalak a ni ang.

BUNG III
 RAM HMASAWNNA RUANGAM LIAN
 Infrastructural Development

 1.KALPHUNG THAR - Kawlphetha siam chhuah kawngah 

i.Tuikhuah (Hydel Project) leh Ni zung (Solar Power) hmangin kawlphethaa intodelh thuai turin tan lak a ni ang. 

ii.Hydel Project tuikhuahte hi kawng hrang hranga hman tangkai theih tur (multipurpose Project) ang zawnga kalpuiin - tui in tur atan te, thlai chawmna atan te, sangha khawina atan te leh, water-sport atan te hman tangkai an ni ang. 

iii.Hydel Project eng emaw zat, Mizoram sorkar-in tuikhuaptu Company te nena Inremsiamna (MOU) an lo ziahpui tawh kum eng emaw zat ral hnu pawha hmalakna engmah awm zui si lote hi en nawnin, titawp (cancel) emaw, bawhzui emaw zawnga tan lak a ni ang.


 2. KALPHUNG THAR - Tui In tur leh Thlaichawmna tur Tui pek
 Efficient Water Management
 Mihring khawsak nana tui in tur thianghlim hnianghnara pek bakah, tlangram leilet (terrace cultivation) siamtute, sumchang thlai leh thei huan siamtuten tui hman khawp an neih theih nan – 

i. Ni zung tha (Solar Power) leh kawlphetha pangngai (Conventional Power) te hmangin hmun sang zawka tui pump chho leh, van-ruahtui tla khâwl khawm (water harvest) te nena tangkawpin tuizem lian (water reservoir) ahte chhung khawmin - tui in tur, leh thlai chawmna atâna hman tur tui tam tâwk pe turin hma kan la ang. ii. A chunga mi anga kan tih chuan tui in tur pawh man tlâwm zâwk leh hnianghnar zawkin mipuite hnenah kan pe thei tawh ang. 

iii. Lui dung hmun remchâng apiangah thlai chawmna tuikhuah (agriculture dam) siamin, luikam zawl remchâng awm apiangah leilet leh thlai chinna hmun siam turin hma kan la ang. 


3. KALPHUNG THAR – Inkalpawhna tha siam
 Transport and Communication
 Ram chhung inkalpawhna leh ram pawn nena inkalpawhtawnna Kawngpui- Roadways, Relkawng – Railways, Thlawhna – Airways leh Luilian hmanga Inkalpawhna - Inland Waterways changtlung zawk nei turin chak taka hmalak a ni ang. 

Kawngpui :
 i. Mizoramah Kawngpui tha leh tlo, kum tam tak daih tur siam a nih theih nan theihtawp chhuah a ni ang. 

ii. Mizoram chhunga lui lian kana leidawh (bridges) te hi thir tlawn remkhawm (bailey bridges) mai an nih hlawm avangin an tha tawk lova; Concrete enforcement-a thlâk vek turin Sorkar Laipuia ‘Ministries of Road Transport and Highways’, hnęnah thlenin chak taka hmalak a ni ang.

 iii. Tlâng kawng (Rural Road) siam leh enkawl zui hnâah, a chhhawrtu ber khaw mipuite tha a tam thei ang ber hmang tangkaiin sorkarin a thawk thin ang.

 iv. Mizoram chhunga kawngte a that loh avânga mipuiiin harsatna namęn lo kan tawh fo thin hi pumpelh a nih theih nan, kawng siam hun laia endiktu tur ‘Quality Control Squad’ kan din ang. 

v. Border Road Orgaization hnuaia Project Pushpak-ten Mizoram kawngpui thenkhat an enkawl thin, kum 2004-5 chho vel atanga an enkawl tak loh kawngte hi Border Road Organization-in an enkawl leh theih nan hma kan la ang

 vi. Bangladesh leh Myanmar nena ramri 825 Kms. lai nei kan nih avangin, ram venhimna (defence) lam ngaihtuah pawha kawngpui tha neih a tulzia Sorkar Laipui hnęnah ngawrh zawka thlenin, a bika ngaihpawimawh kan hlawh theih nan tan kan la ang.


 Airport, Helipad leh Relkawng:

 i. Ram chhung leh ram pawnah thlawhna hmanga inkalpawh zung zung theih nan, a remchan dan ang zela Airport leh Helipad tam zawk siam tura hmalak a ni ang.

 ii. Tuna Sairang thlenga Rail kawng siam mek hi chak zawka hmalak a nih theih nan sorkar-in Rail-kawng siamtute hi tawiawmna (support) tha zawk sorkar-in a pe ang a; Railway kaihhnawiha hna tam tak awm turah Mizo thalaite a tam thei ang ber dah lűt turin tan kan la ang. 


4. KALPHUNG THAR -
Khualzinmite Hîp tura hmalak
 Development of Tourists Attraction 
 
 Mizoram hi khualzin tam zawkin an rawn tlawh a, heng khualzinte lo enkawlna atanga kan thalaite tana hna thawh tur tam tak siam chhuak tur leh, sawrkar tan pawh sum (revenue) lakluhna tha tak a nih theih nan, khualzinmite hip theihna tur ruahmanna lian tham takin kan kalpui ang.

 

Hmalak dan tur:
 i. Khualzinmite en duh tur: tlang – kham – puk - tuikhawhthla - wildlife sanctuary – sahuan - pipute sulhnu thil hlui –etc. thlan chhuah bik kan nei ang. 

iii. Sports changkang: Lawngleng hmanga infiamna - River/Lakeboating, boruaka thlawh - para-cliding, khamlawn – mountain climbing te thlengin kan buatsaih ang. 

iv.Mizo kutchhuak: puan - kawr - ipte - lukhum - nghawngbah – nghawngawrh, thil cheimawi (artefac) etc. tam zawk, changkang zawk leh nalh zawk zawrhna dawr bik te kan siam ang.

 v.Khualzinmite hîp turin: Mizo kut hrang hrang - Chapchar Kut, Thalfavang Kut - Kristmas - Kumthar hunlaiah te abîka khualzinmite hîp thei zawng turin turin tan kan la uar ang. 

vi.Khualzinmiten Mizo Lam (cultural dance) chi hrang hrangte an hmuh theihna turin, chutiang en theihna hmun bik Hotelte kan sorkar-in a thlang (designate) ang. 

vii. Sakhaw lam tuipui mite (religious pilgrims) kan hip theih nan Aizawl khawpui hi ‘City of Churches – Biak In Khawpui’ ah kan puang ang. viii. Khualzinmite mimal ina thleng a, an ei leh in ang te eipui a, Mizote ch>t dân zirchiang duhte tan - mimal in kianga thlenna khualbuk sak - Home Stay te kan chîng chhuak (introduce) ang.


 5. KALPHUNG THAR - Khawpui Zauh Creation of Planned Cities and Towns Aizawl khawpui leh District khawpuihote hi a remchan dan ang anga zauh a, khawpui thâwl leh chenna nuam zâwk siam turin chak takin hma kan la ang.
 Hmalâk dân tur: 

i.Khaw thar siam tura thiamna bik nei – Town Planner -te ruaiin, kum tam tak lo la awm tur thlîr lâwkna neiin, khawpui thâwl leh chęnna nuam leh hrisel (environmental friendly) nei tura hmun thâwl deuhva khawpui thar din. 

ii.Hengte hi tih theih a nih hma pawhin, tuna kan khawpui neih mekah te pawh hian tih theih tam tak a awm.

 *Mahni ram chin bâk pęla kawngpui kama in sate n>na inbiakremna neia kawngpui zauh. 

*Mahni inhmun pass china in sate pawh an in sak sa tichhe lova, an kawtzawl/bathlar pawi lo chin vantlang kawngpui atâna lak thensak a, zangnadawmna (compensation) pek. 

* Aizawl bîkah phei chuan, thui tak hma lo lak tawhna - Assam Rifles hmunpui hi sawn chhuah a, chu hmun ruaka Motor Parking leh vantlang hmun pawimawh dangte dah. 

iii. Market lian leh thianghlim, hmun laili, panna nuam zawkah te din tura hmalak a ni ang. (NB: Aizawl khawpui leh Lunglei khawpui zauhna tur phei chu Ruahman lawkna tha tak – Master Plan pawh neih sa vek a ni


 6.KALPHUNG THAR –
Bana Kaih Policy
 Hand Holding Policy

i. Hna thawh tur tha duang chhuak thiam, bul tanna tur sum mamawhte chu sorkar-in Bank hrang hrang kaltlangin sum pűk tur a ngaihtuahsak ang a, sorkar chu Guarantor-ah a tang ang. ‘Mizoram Ceiling on Government Guarantees Act, 2001’ hi nuai bo a ni ang a, a aiah Central Scheme awmsa ‘Credit Guarantors Scheme’ hman a ni ang. 

ii. Chutiang bawkin, kuthnathawktute thlai thar chhuah Sorkarin a leisak tur bîkte thlangin a rate siam lawk a ni ang a; a hralhna rate hre sain loneituten thlai an ching ang. Hemi kawnga hma lâkna hmasa atan - sorkar-in sawhthing kg. khat Rs. 50, hmunphiah kg. khat Rs. 100-in a lei ang. Sorkar-in a leina tur rate aia sang zawka hralh duhte tan zalęnna siam a ni ang. 

iii. Kut hnathawktuten huan nghet, lo nghet leh eizawnna ngelnghet an neih theih nan sorkar-in a tul ang zela tanpuiin, an hlawhtlin hma loh chuan a tanpui ang.

 iv. Feh kawng, thlai phur motor kal theihna (Economic Road) ngaih pawimawh a ni ang a, thlawhhma neitute kutke bera hmangin sorkar-in a laihsak ang.

 v. Heng ruahmanate tipuitling tur hian budget-ah sum DAH a ni ang. 
 
 7. KALPHUNG THAR - Zirna enkawlna lamah

 i. Elementary School enkawl turin Village/Block level-ah Education Committee din a ni ang a, sorkar nen thawk dunin zirtirtu lak, sawn (transfer) leh enkawlnaah politiks inrawlh khap tlat a ni ang. 

ii. Zirnate chu, zir zawh hnua hnathawh tur zawn buai ngai lova, mahnia eizawnna bul tan theihna tur ang zawng chi (Vocational Education) kalpui a uar ang. 

iii.Thingtlanga school tinah zirtirtute awmna In (school quarters) nei vek tura hmalak a ni ang. 

iv. Tuna hman mek, skul zing dar 8-a tan hian – naupang leh chhungkaw inrelbawlnaah nghawng tha lo zawk nei nia a lan avangin siam danglam (re-schedule) a ni ang. 

iv. Central-a hna lian tak tak All India Services leh Central Services-a Zofate a tam thei ang ber kan luh theihna turin ‘Coaching Institution’ changtlung leh rintlak kan din ang. 

v. All India Services leh Central Services-a Preliminary leh Main Examination-a inziak tlingte chu, an hlawhtlin ngei theih nan pawisa faia tanpuina (Cash Incentives) tha tawk kan pe ang. 

vi. Zirna huangah zirlai naupangte mamawh pek leh tha taka an zir theihna turin remchanna tha zawk ngaihtuahsak zel a ni ang. 

vii. Khawvel puma tawng lar ber English leh India rama tawng tlanglâwn ber Hindi te hi thangtharte’n nal taka thiam turin nasa taka tan lak a ni ang. 
 viii. Electronic Governance or e-governance lama Zofa nawlpuiten tun aia kan hman tangkai theihna turin sorkar-in nasa takin hma a la ang. 
 ix.Pathian Thu Zirna hmun puitling (Theological Educational Institution) a zir chhuaka Degree neite chu Mizoram sorkar hnuaia hna zawnnaah an degree tlukpui ang zela pawm an ni ang.

 x.Mizoram chhim lama chengten zirna sang zawk (Master Degree) thleng an neih theih nan Mizoram University Southern Campus – Lungleiah dah turin sorkar-in chak takin hma a la ang. 

xi.Mizoramin zirna lama hmasâwnna chak taka kan kalpui theih nan ‘Mizoram Education Reform Commission’ kan din ang. He Commission hian –

 a) Mizoram Education Service (MES) siam tura zirchianna neiin, sorkar-ah recommendation a thehlut ang. 

b) ‘Continuous and Comprehensive Evaluation System - CCES’ hi Mizoramah kalpui zel chi a nih leh nih loh a zir chiang ang. 

c) Mizorama School leh College-te hi Indian Standard of Education phak tura kalpui turin rawtna (recommendation) sawrkar-ah a thlen ang. 

d). UGC duhdan ang taka Mizorama College administration hi kalpui a nih theih nan zirchianna neiin, sorkar-ah rawtna a thlen ang. 
 e) School Level-ah Pay Structure ennawnin dik tâwk lo lai apiangte siam tha tűrin sorkar-ah rawtna a thlen ang. 

f) School Education leh College Education hnuaia Transfer and Posting fel tawk lote chingfel turin he Commission hian sorkar-ah rawtna a siam ang. 
 g)Tunhma lama School Endik - School Inspection ang kha tharthawh leh leh dan a ngaihtuah ang.

 h)Information Technology lama chak taka hma kan sawn theih nan kan Policy hman mękte ennawnin, siamthat ngai lai apiangte siam tha turin rawtna a thlen ang. 


8. KALPHUNG THAR - Tualchhung kutchhuak chawisan
 Made in Mizoram and Economic Nationalism
 Hnam zia chawisanna leh mi tam tak tana eizawnna siamsakna tur nipah fawmin, tualchhung kutchhuak hman uar sorkar-in a uar (promote) ang. 
 i.Mizorama thil siam chhuahte chu man to zawk pawh ni sela, sorkar office, sawrkar bangla, Rest House, Tourist Lodge, sorkar enkawl zirna in leh hall-ah te hman uar a ni ang 

ii.Zirlaite Uniform chi hrang hrangah tualchhuak leh Mizoram chhunga siam chhuahte ngei hmang tam tura inzirtir uar a ni ang. 

iii. Hnam zerang lanchhuah theihna - kawr chi hrang hrang, puan, puanbah, nghawngawrh (necktie), ip-te, tarmawi in chhung cheimawina (decorative items) ang chite hi, Mizoram chhung mai ni lo, India ram hmundang leh ramdang (foreign) thleng pawha hralha, tilar turin hmalak a ni ang.

 iv. Hetiang siam chhuaktute chu an bul tanna atan, an mamawh ang zelin sorkar-in sum puk tur (loan) te a ngaihtuahsak ang. 

v. Pawnlam atanga lak luh bungruaten Mizorama thil siam chhuahte an tlawmral (outsale) loh nan sorkar-in puihna (subsidy) a pe thin ang. 

vi.Zorama mipui nawlpuiten mahni ram chhűnga thil siam ngei hman leh ngaihsanna rilru an put theih nan inzirtirna (awareness) uar takin sorkar-in a kalpui ang. 

vii. Thilsiamtuten mawi, nalh, tlo leh, mit hip thei zawnga thil an siam chhuah theih nan, sorkar-in ramchhung leh rampawn lamah zirthiam zualna (training) te a buatsaihsak ang. 
 viii. Hetianga kan ram chhung thilsiam chhuah ngei lei dan (Preferential Purchase Rule) mumal tak kan siam ang.Ex


 9.KALPHUNG THAR –Lei Hnuai Hausakna Inphum Haichhuah
 Tapping of Underground Resources
 Mizoram lei hnuaia hausakna (underground resources) tam tak inphumte hi, ram mipuiten tangkai taka kan hman a, sorkar pawhin sum hnar tha tak kan neih theih nan, hai chhuak turin nasa lehzualin hma kan la ang.

 3. Apart from giving necessary aid and assistance, to the workers new marketing system shall . be introduced to facilitated selling of farm produces and other products. Such facilities shall include minimum support price system, "subsidies, insurance and rebate, etc.
 4. Food Processing Industries shall be given priorities special attention shall be given to Ginger cultivation and ginger markets.
 5. Special Development Scheme (in a cluster system) shall be worked out, to facilitated all kind of manual workers, in the process of cultivation processing, manufacturing and marketing.
 6. As envisaged in the scheme of SEDP, effort shall be made to initiate various industries, including farming, manufacturing, mining, Eco-Tourism, adventure tourism. Agro and Forest- based Industries including bamboo processing, herbal and pharmaceutical and service industries, shall be given utmost attention.
 7. Worker facility schemes such as — Accidental insurance (PMJJY), Health Care Scheme, Crop Insurance (PMFBY), Group Insurance (under SBI Scheme) and E.P.F shall be effectively implemented.
 8. Worker Facility Scheme under Mizoram Building and other Construction Workers Welfare Board shall be reviewed and revised.
 9. Standard Vegetable shops, meat shops and other requirements shall be introduced.

INFRASTRUTURE DEVELOPMENT
 1. The existing State and National Highways shall be properly maintained. New roads connecting East-West and North-South shall be constructed wherever necessary. Attempt will be made to make inland water- ways by development river courses.
 2. For the benefits of farmers, economic roads and agriculture link roads shall be constructed wherever necessary.
 3. Lengpui Airport shall be improved in all possible ways, so as to enable cargo plane operations. Attempt will be made for New airport in the Southern area of Mizoram.
 4. Lunglei town shall be further developed by creating more facilities and amenities for its population. Lunglei High Power Committee shall be given more power and funds. Attempt will be made to established different offices like Area Commissioner Office, University Campus, Police Southern Range, etc.
 5. Attempt will be made to make Mizoram Self Sufficient in matters of power generation. Utmost effort shall be made to generate Solar Energy, and other renewable energy apart from tapping hydro-power energy.
 6. Tourist Resorts and Institute of Hotel Management, initiated by the MNF -Ministry in 2008, shall be taken up afresh and improved. And Eco-Tourism shall be given high priority.
 7. Attempt will be made to construct more FCI Godowns, Gas Bottling Plants and Petroleum Oil Depots.
 8. Effort shall be made to complete Oil and Gas survey and explorations so as to speed up economic development of the State.

SOCIAL DEVELOPMENT AND SOCIAL SECURITY
 1. The MLPC Act 2014 shall be withdrawn forthwith. Better and improved Rehabilitation Centres shall be established in Cooperation with NGO's and Churches.
 2. Hospital and Health: Centres shall be better equipped. Shortage of Doctor and Nurses shall be met by recruiting more doctors and nurses.
 3. Mizoram State Health Care Scheme will be revised and implemented.
 4. Old-age pension shall be awarded to all persons who are within the bracket. of old-age pension scheme.
 5. The PWD Act shall be applied to all cases of physical and mental handicapcy, throughout Mizoram.
 6. Women and Child right shall be enforced in right earnest.
 7. Grant of relief shall be given immediately to the victims of national calamities. In the case of death of the sole bread-earner of the family a scheme shall be drawn up to bring up and support the minors of the family.
 8. Public distribution system of essential commodities shall be upgraded, so as to cater the need of the consumers better. The MNF government shall try to improve, LPG distribution, water and electric supply.
 9. Attempt will be made to provide House site for those who are homeless and helpless.
 10. Utmost effort shall be made in all possible ways, to revive Mizo Tlawmngaihna (which spring-out from the spirit of natural principle of justice, honesty, fairness, perseverance and selflessness).

EDUCATION and YOUTH AFFAIRS
 1. School Calendar and School timing shall be revised and re-adjusted so as to suit Mizo work 'culture and food habit.
 2. Student Scholarship shall be paid in a timely manner and student loan for higher studies shall be made available to all deserving students.
 3. System of education shall be reformed to heighten educational standard comparable with the education standard in any other advanced countries.
 4. Existing educational Institution shall .be upgraded and improved. Various need of the teachers and students may be provided. Shortage of teachers shall be addressed.
 5. Service facilities such as Provident Fund, Pension, Health Insurance shall be given to all workers who are serving under different scheme of centrally sponsored programmes. Teachers working in Private and aided schools, including school run by the churches shall also be given similar facilities.
 6. Institute for medical studies, para-medical, engineering, Technology and Management shall be established as soon as possible. 7. In order to enable bright students to study in foreign countries, step will be taken for Man-Power Development.
 8. Sports policy shall be framed in tune with the provisions of Olympics charter. Sports facilities shall be provided to all Institutions and Academy. More fund will be provided in Sports budget.
 9. Incentive Award scheme shall be drawn up so as to attract young students who will be-able to quality themselves for All India Services and Military Services.
 10. Student hostel shall be established in all District Headquarters if needed.
 11. Entrepreneurship Training shall be taken up on thrust programme basis.
